amendment.description: Amendment to require the Director of National Intelligence to submit to Congress a report containing recommendations the Director considers appropriate for consolidating the intelligence community.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-75 to require the Director of National Intelligence to submit to Congress a report containing recommendations the Director considers appropriate for consolidating the intelligence community.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 278 - 123 (Roll no. 324).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 278 - 123 (Roll no. 324).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Gibson.
